actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill providing that the United States shall be deemed liable in the case of any judgment levied by any court against any diplomat against whom a recovery of damages is statutorily not allowed.

summary.text: Makes the United States liable for the damages levied by any court against persons with diplomatic immunity if such judgment is deemed void by virtue of such immunity.

titles.title: A bill providing that the United States shall be deemed liable in the case of any judgment levied by any court against any diplomat against whom a recovery of damages is statutorily not allowed.
